title: Sports: Soccer (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Soccer subcategory within Sports. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: Since 1999, the Japanese soccer league has had two divisions: J-1 and J-2.
cards.romaji: sen ky.hyaku ky.j. ky.nen ik , nihon no sakk. wa jeiwan to jeits. no futatsu no r.gu ga arimasu.
cards.japanese: 千九百九十九年以降、日本のサッカーはJ1とJ2の二つのリーグがあります。
